page.title: 01General Review
page.content: The survey area comprises the southern half of the town of Lyndhurst and the hamlets of Bank and Gritnam. The remainder consists of forest with some farmland. The New Forest covers approximately 9 sq.km. of the area, with 2 sq.km. covered by farmland. The areas of settlement are primarily residential, most of the amenities being provided in N.Lyndhurst, the study block to the North. Our project includes a study of:- The New Forest The Hampshire Cattle Breeders Parkhill Hotel Foxlease House-Girl Guides Association -Training Headquarters Waverley Farm New Forest District Council Housing in South Lyndhurst News & Views
